## Quick Start

### Clean generated files

``` bash
$ hexo c
```
### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo g
```
### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo s
```
### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo d
```
### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```
